Class Vocabulary

  • java.lang.Object
    • vocabulary.Vocabulary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VocabularyBuilder

    public class Vocabulary
extends java.lang.Object
implements VocabularyBuilder
    This class represents vocabulary (wordlist or a reference dictionary)
    Author:
    Elena Khasanova
